uk.me.doof.Lander uk.me.doof.Lander.desktop FSFAP GPL-3.0-or-later Lander Lunar Lander Game
This is a lunar lander style arcade game. Use the arrow keys to move the ship and avoid crashing into obstacles. Collect all the spinning keys and then land the ship on one of the landing pads. The levels are randomly generated and become progressively harder. ​ ​
